[`Vault`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Vault.md) â€º [`configDir`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Vault/configDir.md)

## Vault.configDir property

Gets the path to the config folder. This value is typically `.obsidian` but it could be different.

**Signature:**

```typescript
configDir: string;
```
